evidence.text: MOTION for Preliminary Injunction by United States of America. Motion(s) will be submitted on 6/14/2023.

extracted.value: United States of America filed a Motion for Preliminary Injunction on March 20, 2023, seeking a preliminary injunction with a submission date set for June 14, 2023.

evidence.text: *DEFICIENT* MOTION for Order Governing Proceedings Relating to Plaintiff's Motion for Preliminary Injunction (R. Doc. 9 ) by Denka Performance Elastomer LLC. Motion(s) will be submitted on 4/19/2023.

extracted.value: Denka Performance Elastomer LLC filed a Deficient Motion to Continue the Submission Date for the United States' Motion for Preliminary Injunction on March 28, 2023, with a submission date set for April 19, 2023.

evidence.text: MOTION to Dismiss for Failure to State a Claim, MOTION to Dismiss for Lack of Jurisdiction by DuPont Specialty Products USA, LLC. Motion(s) will be submitted on 5/31/2023.

extracted.value: DuPont Specialty Products USA, LLC filed a Motion to Dismiss for Failure to State a Claim on May 2, 2023, with a submission date set for May 31, 2023.

evidence.text: MOTION to Dismiss for Lack of Jurisdiction by United States of America. Motion(s) will be submitted on 6/28/2023.

extracted.value: United States of America filed a Motion to Dismiss for Lack of Jurisdiction on May 9, 2023, with a submission date set for June 28, 2023.

evidence.text: RESPONSE/MEMORANDUM in Opposition filed by Denka Performance Elastomer LLC re 9 MOTION for Preliminary Injunction.

extracted.value: Denka Performance Elastomer LLC filed a Response/Memorandum in Opposition to the United States' Motion for Preliminary Injunction on July 18, 2023.

evidence.text: MOTION for Summary Judgment by Denka Performance Elastomer LLC. Motion(s) will be submitted on 2/7/2024.

extracted.value: Denka Performance Elastomer LLC filed a Motion for Summary Judgment on December 29, 2023, with a submission date set for February 7, 2024.

evidence.text: MOTION for Judgment on the Pleadings by DuPont Specialty Products USA, LLC. Motion(s) will be submitted on 1/24/2024.

extracted.value: DuPont Specialty Products USA, LLC filed a Motion for Judgment on the Pleadings on December 29, 2023, with a submission date set for January 24, 2024.
